      --,[IsDeleted]
      --[MasterRecordId] referencja*/

      /*--,[LastName]
      --,[FirstName]
      --,[Salutation]*/

        WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhHAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0E0'
        WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhGAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0LB'
        WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhIAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0LC'
        WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '01220000000AFrcAAG' THEN '0127R000000c0E5'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
      [LastName]
      ,coalesce([FirstName],'_') as FirstName
      ,[Salutation]
      ,[Type]
      ,CASE
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhHAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0E0'
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhGAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0LB'
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '012w0000000QYhIAAW' THEN '0127R000000c0LC'
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = '01220000000AFrcAAG' THEN '0127R000000c0E5'
	   END as RecordTypeId
      ,[BillingStreet]
      ,[BillingCity]
      ,[BillingState]
      ,[BillingPostalCode]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
(select m.Id from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = c.AccountId and m.objectname='Account') as AccountId,
/*IsPersonAccount,*/
c.LastName,
c.FirstName,
c.Salutation,
'' as RecordTypeId,
c.OtherStreet,
c.OtherCity,
c.OtherState,
c.OtherPostalCode,
c.OtherCountry,
c.OtherLatitude,
c.OtherLongitude,
c.OtherGeocodeAccuracy,
c.MailingStreet,
c.MailingCity,
c.MailingState,
c.MailingPostalCode,
c.MailingCountry,
cast(c.MailingLatitude as varchar) as MailingLatitude,
cast(c.MailingLongitude as varchar) as MailingLongitude,
c.MailingGeocodeAccuracy,
c.Phone,
c.Fax,
c.MobilePhone,
c.HomePhone,
c.OtherPhone,
c.AssistantPhone,
c.ReportsToId,
c.Email,
c.Title,
c.Department,
c.AssistantName,
c.LeadSource,
c.Birthdate,
c.[Description],
/*Id, --tutaj zmiana */
c.HasOptedOutOfEmail,
c.HasOptedOutOfFax,
c.DoNotCall,
c.CreatedDate,
/*--CreatedById,systemowa */
c.LastModifiedDate,
/*--LastModifiedById,systemowa
--SystemModstamp,systemowa
--LastActivityDate, --tutaj zmiana
--LastCURequestDate, --tutaj zmiana
--LastCUUpdateDate, --tutaj zmiana
--LastViewedDate, --tutaj zmiana
--LastReferencedDate, --tutaj zmiana*/
c.EmailBouncedReason,
c.EmailBouncedDate,
/*--IsEmailBounced, --tutaj zmiana
--PhotoUrl,*/
c.Jigsaw,
/*--JigsawContactId, --tutaj zmiana*/
c.IndividualId,
/*--IsPriorityRecord, nie znaleziono takiego pola*/
c.Breve_fra_Falck__c,
c.Gode_tilbud__c,
/*--Information_Mangler__c, formułka */
c.Interesser__c,
c.MDB_ID__c,
c.Nyhedsbrev__c,
c.Email_Updated__c,
c.Email_Updated_By__c,
/*--Kunde_nr__c, formułka 
--Adresse__c, formułka */
c.Permissions_channels__c,
c.Kundenr_Dup__c,
c.BtB_Decision_Maker_Within_Productfamily__c,
c.Inactive__c,
c.Is_Dummy_Campaign_Contact__c,
c.Is_Primary__c,
c.Migration_Data_Key__c,
c.Role__c,
c.bypass_validations__c,
c.Kundenr_Dup_contact_del__c,
c.Gender__c,
/*--Is_customer__c, */
c.Has_Received_Welcome_Gift__c,
c.mitfalckdk_last_login__c, 
/*--ASF3__Account_Aria_Id__c, nie ma w nowym systemie */
c.smagicinteract__SMSOptOut__c,
/* --Contact_No__c, brak uprawnień */
c.Permissions_channels_BtB__c,
/*--ASF3__Aria_Company_Name__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_Home_Phone_Extension__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_International_Cell_Phone__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_International_Phone__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_Middle_Initial__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Aria_Work_Phone_Extension__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Country_Code__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Do_Not_Use_Email__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Languages__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Level__c, nie ma w nowym systemie
--ASF3__Unique_Key__c, nie ma w nowym systemie */
c.Account_No_Dup__c,
/*--Contact_Match_Criteria__c, formułka */
c.MailingAddressAwsId__c,
c.MailingAddressKvhx__c,
/*--Mailing_Address_Letter__c, formułka
--Name_and_Address_Letter__c, formułka */
c.Person_Name__c,
/*--Print_Order_Name__c, formułka
--Reminders__c, formułka */
c.Supplementary_Name__c,
c.Sync_From_Account__c,
/*--Address_Changed_Date__c, formułka*/
c.PBS_mobile_sign_up_consent__c,
c.Id as LegacyId__c
from [SF_Archive].[Contact] c where c.IsPersonAccount = 'False' and c.AccountId in (select AccountId from audit.mig_account_list)

activities.name: Salesforce - Load LEAD
activities.description: Copy activity to copy one object

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
l.LastName,
l.FirstName,
l.Salutation,
l.Title,
l.Company,
l.Street,
l.City,
l.State,
l.PostalCode,
l.Country,
l.Latitude,
l.Longitude,
l.GeocodeAccuracy,
l.Phone,
l.MobilePhone,
l.Fax,
l.Email,
l.Website,
l.Description,
l.LeadSource,
l.Status,
l.Industry,
l.Rating,
l.AnnualRevenue,
l.NumberOfEmployees,
l.HasOptedOutOfEmail,
l.IsConverted,
l.ConvertedDate, 
case 
	when l.IsConverted =1 
	then (select m.Id from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = l.ConvertedAccountId and m.objectname='Account') 
end ConvertedAccountId,
case 
	when l.IsConverted =1 
	then (select m.PersonContactId from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = l.ConvertedAccountId and m.objectname='Account') 
end ConvertedContactId,
l.IsUnreadByOwner,
DATETRUNC(day, CONVERT(DATETIME, l.CreatedDate)) as CreatedDate,
l.LastModifiedDate,
l.DoNotCall,
l.HasOptedOutOfFax,
l.smagicinteract__SMSOptOut__c,
l.Unica_AddressLine1__c,
l.Unica_AddressLine2__c,
l.Unica_Base_ID__c,
l.Unica_City__c,
l.Unica_MDB_ID__c,
l.Unica_ZipCode__c,
l.Id as LegacyId__c
from SF_archive.Lead l
where l.IsDeleted = 0 
and (
	exists (select 1 from [Audit].[mig_account_list] a where l.ConvertedAccountId = a.AccountId)
	or 
	l.ConvertedAccountId is null
)

from 
SF_Archive.Opportunity o 
where 
(
    o.AccountId in (select AccountId from audit.mig_account_list) 
    or o.AccountId is null
) and o.IsDeleted = 0

select Id, LegacyId__c from Contact where LegacyId__c != null

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
	u.License_Type__c,
	u.Notes__c,
	'('||u.id||')'||u.FA_nummer__c as FA_nummer__c
	u.DK_Nummer__c,
	u.External_Maintainer_For_Company_Master__c,
	u.Loop__LOOPlus_Tester__c,
	u.Loop__dsPassword__c,
	u.Loop__dsToken__c,
	u.DB_Region__c,
	u.Salgskanal__c,
	u.Salarynumber__c,
	u.RequestedPermissionSets__c,
	'(Migrated)'||u.Username as UserName,
	u.CompanyName,
	u.Division,
	u.Department,
	u.Title,
	u.Email,
	--u.EmailPreferences,
	u.SenderEmail,
	u.SenderName,
	u.Signature,
	u.StayInTouchSubject,
	u.StayInTouchSignature,
	u.StayInTouchNote,
	u.Phone,
	u.Fax,
	u.MobilePhone,
	u.Alias,
	'(Migrated)'||u.CommunityNickname as CommunityNickname,
	u.IsActive,
	u.TimeZoneSidKey,
	u.LocaleSidKey,
	u.ReceivesInfoEmails,
	u.ReceivesAdminInfoEmails,
	u.EmailEncodingKey,
	u.LanguageLocaleKey,
	u.EmployeeNumber,
	u.DelegatedApproverId,
	--u.CreatedById,
	--u.LastModifiedById,
	--u.UserPermissions,
	--u.NeedsNewPassword,
	u.ForecastEnabled,
	--u.UserPreferences,
	--(select m.Id from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = u.AccountId and m.objectname='Account') as AccountId,
	u.CallCenterId,
	u.Extension,
	u.FederationIdentifier,
	u.AboutMe,
	--u.MediumPhotoUrl,
	u.DigestFrequency,
	u.DefaultGroupNotificationFrequency,
	u.id as LegacyId__c,
	'00e7R000001CYxOQAW' as ProfileId,
	u.FirstName,
	u.LastName
from 
SF_Archive.SF_User u

source.query: select Id, LegacyId__c,PersonContactId from User where LegacyId__c != null
